content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, I'm glad to meet you. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The apartment is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc. I offer it for 1000 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 1000 Euro per month is too low. I am looking for a higher price. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I understand your point. How about 1100 Euro per month? This is a fair price considering the location and the condition of the apartment.
[Question]
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 900 Euro per month!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: [Response] I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I already stated that 900 Euro per month is too low and I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I apologize for the misunderstanding. How about 1200 Euro per month? This is a reasonable price for such an apartment in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: [Response] 1200 Euro per month is more reasonable, but I still think it could be higher. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Considering the location and the condition of the apartment, 1200 Euro per month is a good price. I don't want to go any higher.
[Question] [/Response][Response]
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 1350 Euro per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 1200 Euro per month!
name: Haoyu Wang from China
